## COMMAND_METADATA_KEY

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/i18n/src/constants.ts" sourceLine="14" packageName="@commandkit/i18n" />

Metadata key for command localization.
This key is used to store metadata about commands in the i18n system.
